com.easemob.chat
类 NotificationCompat.InboxStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.easemob.chat.NotificationCompat.Style
      com.easemob.chat.NotificationCompat.InboxStyle
包容类：
NotificationCompat
public static class NotificationCompat.InboxStyle
extends NotificationCompat.Style

Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include a list of (up to 5) strings.
If the platform does not provide large-format notifications, this method has no effect. The user will always see the normal notification view.
This class is a "rebuilder": It attaches to a Builder object and modifies its behavior, like so: 

 Notification noti = new Notification.Builder()
     .setContentTitle("5 New mails from " + sender.toString())
     .setContentText(subject)
     .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.new_mail)
     .setLargeIcon(aBitmap)
     .setStyle(new Notification.InboxStyle()
         .addLine(str1)
         .addLine(str2)
         .setContentTitle("")
         .setSummaryText("+3 more"))
     .build();

另请参见：
Notification#bigContentView

方法摘要
 NotificationCompat.InboxStyle addLine(java.lang.CharSequence cs)
          Append a line to the digest section of the Inbox notification.
 NotificationCompat.InboxStyle setBigContentTitle(java.lang.CharSequence title)
          Overrides ContentTitle in the big form of the template.
 NotificationCompat.InboxStyle setSummaryText(java.lang.CharSequence cs)
          Set the first line of text after the detail section in the big form of the template.

NotificationCompat.InboxStyle

public NotificationCompat.InboxStyle()

方法详细信息

setBigContentTitle

public NotificationCompat.InboxStyle setBigContentTitle(java.lang.CharSequence title)
Overrides ContentTitle in the big form of the template. This defaults to the value passed to setContentTitle().

setSummaryText

public NotificationCompat.InboxStyle setSummaryText(java.lang.CharSequence cs)
Set the first line of text after the detail section in the big form of the template.

addLine

public NotificationCompat.InboxStyle addLine(java.lang.CharSequence cs)
Append a line to the digest section of the Inbox notification.
